description: '''Katherinne Huerta''' (born October 5, 1997), known professionally as '''Bellakath''', is a Mexican singer, songwriter and record producer. She started releasing music in 2020 and went viral after the release of her single "Gatita" in 2022 and for the single "Reggaeton Champagne" with [[Dani Flow]] in 2023. On October 5, 2023, she released her first studio album ''Kittyponeo''.
